name: replace formulas in Excel
description: open a xlsx or xslm file in winzip, allow to edit the content of the sheets in plain xml.
content:
<conditionalFormatting sqref="R208 R200 R193 R215 R267 R260 R253 R312 R326 R319">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="8" priority="2248" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(R189,R190,R192),R193)</formula>
    </cfRule>
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="7" priority="2249" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D193:Q193),R193)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="R217:R218">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="6" priority="2256" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(R215,R208),R217)</formula>
    </cfRule>
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="5" priority="2257" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D217:Q217),R217)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="R222">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="4" priority="2258" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(R200,R217,R193),R222)</formula>
    </cfRule>
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="3" priority="2259" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D222:Q222),R222)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="R270 R329">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="2" priority="2278" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(R267,R260,R253),R270)</formula>
    </cfRule>
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="1" priority="2279" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D270:Q270),R270)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
author: mkoenings
